message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10000. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $8000 to you, and you'll be getting it for less. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. That's the highest I'm willing to go.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more to $9500. This is a fair price, considering the value of the product to you. Let's meet in the middle!
I'm still a bit above my budget with your offer of $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $9000. That's my final offer.
